Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed near Ashland
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing near Ashland due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing near Ashland due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
